all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
I am the same which spake, and the world was made, and all things came by me.
Doctrine and Covenants 38:3
Quote of the Day
"The Lord Jesus Christ … was a perfect example of seeking out the one in every moment of His mortal ministry."
Aroldo B. Cavalcante | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
